verses.verse: And <S%G2117>early<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> with the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4892>Council,<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G4160>held<s%> a <S%G4824>consultation;<s%> and <S%G1210>binding<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> they <S%G667>led<s%> Him <S%G667>away,<s%> and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him up to <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>
And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him, "Are You the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?" And <S%G611>answering<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "[It is as] you <S%G3004>say.<s%>"
And the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> [began] to <S%G2723>accuse<s%> Him <S%G4183>harshly.<s%>

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> was <S%G1905>questioning<s%> Him <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Do You <S%G611>make<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G611>answer<s%>? <S%G2396>See<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G2723>charges<s%> they <S%G2723>bring<s%> <S%G2723>against<s%> You!"
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>made<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3765><s%> <S%G3765>further<s%> <S%G611>answer;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> was <S%G2296>amazed.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> at [the] <S%G1859>feast<s%> he used to <S%G630>release<s%> for them [any] <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G3868>requested.<s%>

And the man <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G1210>imprisoned<s%> with the <S%G4714>insurrectionists<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> had <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G5408>murder<s%> in the <S%G4714>insurrection.<s%>
And the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up and <S%G757>began<s%> <S%G154>asking<s%> him [to <S%G4160>do<s%>] as he had been accustomed to do for them.
And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Do you <S%G2309>want<s%> me to <S%G630>release<s%> for you the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?"
For he was <S%G1097>aware<s%> that the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> had <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him up <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G5355>envy.<s%>
But the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G383>stirred<s%> up the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> [to ask] him to <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> for them <S%G3123>instead.<s%>

And <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G3767>"Then<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> with Him <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3004>call<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?"
And they <S%G2896>shouted<s%> <S%G3825>back,<s%> <S%G4717>"Crucify<s%> Him!"

But <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G1063>"Why,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> has He <S%G4160>done<s%>?" But they <S%G2896>shouted<s%> <S%G4057>all<s%> the <S%G4057>more,<s%> <S%G4717>"Crucify<s%> Him!"

And <S%G1014>wishing<s%> to <S%G4160>satisfy<s%> <S%G2425><s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G630>released<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> for them, and after having <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5417>scourged,<s%> he <S%G3860>delivered<s%> [Him] to be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

And the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G520>took<s%> Him <S%G520>away<s%> into the <S%G833>palace<s%> (that is, the <S%G4232>Praetorium<s%>), and they <S%G4779>called<s%> <S%G4779>together<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> [Roman] <S%G4686>cohort.<s%>
And they <S%G1737>dressed<s%> Him up in <S%G4209>purple,<s%> and after <S%G4120>weaving<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G174>thorns,<s%> they <S%G4060>put<s%> it on Him;
and they <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G782>acclaim<s%> Him, <S%G5463>"Hail,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews!<s%>"

And they kept <S%G5180>beating<s%> His <S%G2776>head<s%> with a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> and <S%G1716>spitting<s%> at Him, and <S%G1119>kneeling<s%> <S%G5087><s%> and <S%G4352>bowing<s%> <S%G4352>before<s%> Him.

And <S%G3753>after<s%> they had <S%G1702>mocked<s%> Him, they <S%G1562>took<s%> the <S%G4209>purple<s%> <S%G1562>off<s%> Him, and <S%G1746>put<s%> His <S%G2440>garments<s%> on Him. And they <S%G1806>led<s%> Him out to <S%G4717>crucify<s%> Him.

And they <S%G29>pressed<s%> into <S%G29>service<s%> a passer-by <S%G2064>coming<s%> from the <S%G68>country,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene<s%> (the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G223>Alexander<s%> and <S%G4504>Rufus<s%>), to <S%G142>bear<s%> His <S%G4716>cross.<s%>
And they <S%G5342>brought<s%> Him to the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1115>Golgotha,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G3177>translated,<s%> <S%G5117>Place<s%> of a <S%G2898>Skull.<s%>
And they tried to <S%G1325>give<s%> Him <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G4669>mixed<s%> with <S%G4669>myrrh;<s%> but He did not <S%G2983>take<s%> it.

And they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> Him, and <S%G1266>divided<s%> up His <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1266>among<s%> themselves, <S%G906>casting<s%> <S%G2819>lots<s%> for them, [to decide] <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5101>each<s%> should <S%G142>take.<s%>
And it was the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2532>when<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> Him.
And the <S%G1923>inscription<s%> of the <S%G156>charge<s%> <S%G156>against<s%> Him <S%G1924>read,<s%> "THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>"
And they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3027>robbers<s%> with Him, <S%G1520>one<s%> on His <S%G1188>right<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> on His <S%G2176>left.<s%>
[And the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which <S%G3004>says,<s%> "And He was <S%G3049>numbered<s%> with <S%G459>transgressors.<s%>"]

And <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3899>passing<s%> by were <S%G987>hurling<s%> <S%G987>abuse<s%> at Him, <S%G2795>wagging<s%> their <S%G2776>heads,<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3758>"Ha!<s%> You who [are going to] <S%G2647>destroy<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> and <S%G3618>rebuild<s%> it in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%>
<S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself,<s%> and <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G4716>cross!<s%> "

In the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>way<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> along with the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> were <S%G1702>mocking<s%> [Him] <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others;<s%> He <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1438>Himself.<s%>

"Let [this] <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that we may <S%G3708>see<s%> and <S%G4100>believe!<s%>" And <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with Him were <S%G3679>casting<s%> the same <S%G3679>insult<s%> at Him.

And when the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1096>fell<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G7067>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And at the <S%G7067>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G994>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G1682>"Eloi,<s%> <S%G1682>Eloi,<s%> <S%G2982>lama<s%> <S%G4518>sabachthani<s%>?" <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G3177>translated,<s%> "My <S%G2316>God,<s%> My <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1519>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> hast Thou <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> Me?"
And when <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G3936>bystanders<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, they [began] <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2396>"Behold,<s%> He is <S%G5455>calling<s%> for <S%G2243>Elijah.<s%>"

And <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G5143>ran<s%> and <S%G1072>filled<s%> a <S%G4699>sponge<s%> with <S%G3690>sour<s%> <S%G3690>wine,<s%> <S%G4060>put<s%> it on a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> and <S%G4222>gave<s%> Him a <S%G4222>drink,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G863>"Let<s%> us <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2507>take<s%> Him <S%G2507>down.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G863>uttered<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>cry,<s%> and <S%G1606>breathed<s%> His <S%G1606>last.<s%>
And the <S%G2665>veil<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>torn<s%> in <S%G1417>two<s%> from <S%G509>top<s%> to <S%G2736>bottom.<s%>

And when the <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> who was <S%G3936>standing<s%> <S%G1727>right<s%> in <S%G1727>front<s%> of Him, <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G3779>way<s%> He <S%G1606>breathed<s%> His <S%G1606>last,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G230>"Truly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

And there were <S%G2532>also<s%> [some] <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2334>looking<s%> on from a <S%G3113>distance,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> [were] <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%> the <S%G3398>Less<s%> and <S%G2500>Joses,<s%> and <S%G4539>Salome.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> He was in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> they used to <S%G190>follow<s%> Him and <S%G1247>minister<s%> to Him; and [there were] <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G243>women<s%> who had <S%G4872>come<s%> up with Him to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And when <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> it was the <S%G3904>preparation<s%> <S%G3904>day,<s%> that is, the <S%G4315>day<s%> <S%G4315>before<s%> the <S%G4315>Sabbath,<s%>

<S%G2501>Joseph<s%> of <S%G707>Arimathea<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> a <S%G2158>prominent<s%> <S%G1010>member<s%> of the <S%G1010>Council,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> was <S%G4327>waiting<s%> for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and he <S%G5111>gathered<s%> up <S%G5111>courage<s%> and <S%G1525>went<s%> in <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> and <S%G154>asked<s%> for the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> He was <S%G2348>dead<s%> by <S%G2235>this<s%> <S%G2235>time,<s%> and <S%G4341>summoning<s%> the <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> he <S%G1905>questioned<s%> him as to <S%G1487>whether<s%> He was <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G599>dead.<s%>
And <S%G1097>ascertaining<s%> this from the <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> he <S%G1433>granted<s%> the <S%G4430>body<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph.<s%>

And [Joseph] <S%G59>bought<s%> a <S%G4616>linen<s%> <S%G4616>cloth,<s%> <S%G2507>took<s%> Him <S%G2507>down,<s%> <S%G1750>wrapped<s%> Him in the <S%G4616>linen<s%> <S%G4616>cloth,<s%> and <S%G2698>laid<s%> Him in a <S%G3418>tomb<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G2998>hewn<s%> out in the <S%G4073>rock;<s%> and he <S%G4351>rolled<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> the <S%G2374>entrance<s%> of the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>
And <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the [mother] of <S%G2500>Joses<s%> were <S%G2334>looking<s%> on [to see] <S%G4226>where<s%> He was <S%G5087>laid.<s%>
